title: Last Three Bedroom Two Bathroom Available! Call to schedule a tour!

Available', 'Now', 'Classic Comfort with a Modern Twist', 'Designed for your enjoyment both inside and out, this three-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment at Sterling Summerland is available now.', 'Inside, you’ll find a floor plan that gives room to grow.', 'Three spacious bedrooms enjoy walk-in closets along with plush carpeting or wood-style plank flooring.', 'The master en-suite features a separate vanity and a roomy shower/tub combo.', 'An open plan living space allows you to prepare meals for your guests without missing out on the action.', 'A modern breakfast bar enhances the flow in the all-electric kitchen.', 'Head outside where you’ll find a private balcony or patio waiting for you along with covered parking.', 'Stroll along the landscaped paths to one of the community swimming pools, spas, sauna, or steam room.', 'There is also a fitness center to help you meet your fitness goals.', 'There is more to discover!', 'Book your personal tour now.', 'Floor Plan/Unit Amenities:',
